m_szDocTitle: 66% Of Germans Would Consider A Tesla Model 3, According To Poll
m_szDocSumamry: 66% Of Germans Would Consider A Tesla Model 3, According To Poll Originally published on EV Obsession. Despite the strong bias that most German citizens have for German-made cars, it appears that the Tesla Model 3 unveiling has made quite an impact on the public there. A new poll from the German car magazine Autobild found that 66% of those queried said that they would consider buying a Model 3. While that may not sound like a substantial percentage, for a country as insular (in many ways) as Germany, thatâ€™s really quite impressive.
